name: One Shot BUGaloo
description:
A game created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019

One Shot Bugaloo

Fight through hordes of robo-bugs using your trusty (if a little unreliable) weapon.

Try and reach the boss!

Controls: 
Gamepad / Keyboard & Mouse
Move: left stick / wasd or arrows
Aim: right stick / mouse
Shoot: right bumper / left mouse button

Don't forget to pick up your ONLY means of survival!
Try to get to the boss!

Thanks for playing our game!

Credits:
Juliusz Wajgelt
Stanisław Denkowski
Krzysztof Mrzigod
Jan Chyb

Developed with Monogame, Tiled, Tiledsharp and love <3
